channel.title: 🏢 Samsung AI Center Warsaw on NeurIPS 2024
channel.description: Recent content in 🏢 Samsung AI Center Warsaw on NeurIPS 2024

item.title: SOI: Scaling Down Computational Complexity by Estimating Partial States of the Model
item.description: Scattered Online Inference (SOI) drastically cuts down ANN computational complexity by leveraging data continuity and prediction seasonality, enabling faster real-time inference on low-power devices.
